title: Pixel 5 heating up due to stuck update in Background
content:
Hello there, I believe I have an update stuck in background of my pixel 5 but I am not able to proceed with it as it is always heating up even with no tasks and apps running.
I tried to update the software from settings but no luck as it says software is up to date. 
I don't know if anyone has ran into this same issue.
Note that CPU 1-6 are always 100% in use due to this issue.
